topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A security recap identifies a breach involving the Trust Wallet Chrome extension alongside other persistent cyber risks such as IoT botnets and crypto scams via fake wallet updates.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/209811713/status/2008161863201063290

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Attackers allegedly exfiltrated 186 GB of data, including employee and agent account details, customer information, policy records, and financial parameters from an unspecified entity.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mbnzjedaum22

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A sophisticated phishing campaign targeting MetaMask users is utilizing a realistic two-factor authentication (2FA) flow to steal wallet recovery phrases. The scam was highlighted by blockchain security firm SlowMist.
Sources:
- https://beincrypto.com/metamask-phishing-2fa-scam
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28506516/Scam-Alert-Major-Crypto-Wallet-MetaMask-Users-Targeted-by-2FA-Attack
